description: Impulse Tracker is a free music tracker created by Jeffrey Lim and released in 1995. The music sequencing program allows you to create music by organizing notes in different channels as patterns.

You can choose the instruments (and their samples) to be played back according to specified notes by Impulse Tracker. The instruments you can choose from are saved in the ITI format, and users Impulse Tracker users can share them with each other.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .iti file in InterActual Player
images.caption: ITI file open in InterActual Player
